name: Rest in PIX.
description:
- Rest in PIX, - they shouted, then captured the Earth.

Rest in PIX is an endless platformer shooter where you can take revenge on aliens for the fact your life stopped being such cool and carefree.

Press Z to save your progress and X to delete save file.

Press E to shoot.

Credits:

Music: https://opengameart.org/art-search-advanced?field_art_tags_tid=cyberpunk ; https://opengameart.org/content/cyber-street-urchins-looping
